#BlackMagicCraft #Episode199 #Diorama

Big thanks to LOOT for sponsoring this video! If you want to check them out and sign up, head on over to their site: https://bit.ly/2An3JUv
Get in before the end of the month to get your supply of amazing undead models and graveyard goodies!

In this video I construct the scenic base for my 75mm scale zombie diorama. It was really fun creating this big cutaway grave effect, but boy oh boy did I have a hard time with a part that I expected to be a lot easier.

title: I made a big ZOMBIE diorama and it was full of suffering...GRAVE DIGGER P.1
